column4: Is it possible to keep a directory synchronized between 3 PCs (1 runnig Ubuntu, the other 2 running openSUSE) without using an internet solution?
other than lan i dont know :P
Example, I make changes to the files on my desktop, then fly out of state and make changes on my laptop, then when I return, I can sync all 3 together?
how would it be done via LAN? rsync?
